content: WSR 1000 Reciprocating saw 1000W heavy-duty compact reciprocating saw with keyless blade clamp ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features High performance for light demolition work Compact design but ruggedly built Slim width for easier access to tight spaces Powerful 1000W motor for cutting tough materials Lockable switch for continuous cutting Applications Cutting wood Cutting metal ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Metal, Wood Stroke length: 1-1/4 in Stroke rate: 2800 strokes / minute Technical Data | Base material | Metal, Wood | Stroke length | 1-1/4 in | Stroke rate | 2800 strokes/minute | Dust removal system available | No | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 7.3 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 92 dB (A) | 1 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 211893 - Reciprocating saw WSR 1000 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x WSR 1000 120V USA Reciprocating saw
